description: This collection contains 35 soundscape recordings of 32 hours total duration, which have been annotated with 10,294 labels for 176 different bird species from western Kenya. The data were recorded in 2021 and 2022 west and southwest of Lake Baringo in Baringo County, Kenya. This collection has partially been featured as test data in the 2023 BirdCLEF competition and can primarily be used for training and evaluation of machine learning algorithms.
locality: Various sites west and southwest of Lake Baringo
name: Kenya Birds
title: A collection of annotated soundscape recordings from western Kenya
